          <title>
            <string language="hu-HU">Az elektromos mező</string>
            <string language="en-US">Electric field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrisch fangen Sie auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Champ électrique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Campo elétrico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Campo elettrico</string>

          </title>
          <language>hu-HU</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu-HU">Kép elektromos fémrúdról és olajba helyezett búzadaráról</string>
            <string language="en-US">Picture of a charged metal rod and oil put into grits</string>
          </description>

setzte sich in Körner</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Image d'une tige et d'un pétrole chargés en

          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Retrato de uma haste e de um óleo carregados do 
metal postos em grãos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Immagine di un asta e di un olio caricati del 
metallo messi nelle granulosità</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικόνα μιας χρεωμένων ράβδου και ενός πετρελαίου 
μετάλλων που τίθενται grits</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuadro de una barra y de un aceite cargados del 
metal puestos en arenas</string>
          </description>
